_description: Piecewise constant from boundaries and interval values.

boundaries._description: A list of Tensors or ints or floats with strictly increasing entries, and with all elements having the same type as x.

values._description: A list of Tensors or floats or ints that specifies the values for the intervals defined by boundaries. It should have one more element than boundaries, and all elements should have the same type.

name: piecewise_constant
